com.revature.caliber.services

Class AssessmentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.revature.caliber.services.AssessmentService

  • @Service
public class AssessmentService
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for assessment CRUD operations. Includes both Trainer and QC assessments. Application logic has no business being in a DAO nor in a Controller. This is the ideal place for calculations
    Author:
    Patrick Walsh
